posts.post_title: T213-2 Trade Only ++ Bender, with trees ++ Balt. FL
posts.post_content:
***** PLEASE ***** Correspondence ONLY to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

In other words – NO PMs –  you can comment in thread, but please email to follow up.

I’m an idiot – I thought I needed “with trees” but I just realized I have it.  Therefore an “unforeseen” dupe ………………….  

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=662063&d=1748116306[/IMG]

I don’t feel like reselling a card I bought recently …… so, let’s try to trade this for another T213-2 I don’t have.

Thanks, Scott
